messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Getting housework done with babies and young children...
messages.msgSnippet: I have a 6 year old and almost 2 and a new baby and making dinner is a  rush i have found that just about everything do is timed and the faster I can finish it
messages.messageBody:
I have a 6 year old and almost 2 and a new baby and making dinner is a rush
i have found that just about everything do is timed and the faster I can
finish it the better. My new born cries a lot and lord knows we have tried to go
places and I feel like I could cry. Dont get me wrong there are days when
all is well. It does seem like I am always catching up on chores that never get
done. I send you all struggling with the same, happy mommy vibes and house
work love.
Christine
